super.description: Shelly's Super Shell obliterates both cover and enemies. Any survivors get knocked back.
super.name: Super Shell

hypercharge.description: Super Shell is 33% larger.
hypercharge.name: Double Barrel

gadget.name: Fast Forward
gadget.description: Shelly dashes ahead, skipping a few unnecessary steps!
On activation, for the next 5 seconds Shelly's main attacks focus the fire to a smaller area with an increased range.
gadget.name: Clay Pigeons

star.name: Shell Shock
star.description: Shelly's Super shells slow down enemies for 2.0 seconds!
When Shelly falls below 40% health, she instantly heals for 2000 health. Band-Aid recharges in 15.0 seconds.
star.name: Band-Aid

attack.name: Buckshot
attack.description: Shelly's boomstick fires a wide spread of pellets to a medium range. The more pellets hit, the greater the damage.

attack.name: Clean-Up
attack.description: Ash angrily smashes down with his broom. Get out of the way or you might bite the dust!

gadget.description: Though furious, Ash has to collect himself. A full Rage meter will recover 2500 health when this gadget is popped - less Rage, less recovery.
gadget.name: Chill Pill

gadget.description: Ash loses 25% health and instantly gains 40% rage.
gadget.name: Rotten Banana

star.name: First Bash
star.description: When hitting an opponent with his attack charges full, Ash gets even more angry. His Rage goes up by 200%.
Ash progressively gains up to 40% faster reload speed, equal to how enraged he's become.
star.name: Mad As Heck

super.name: Little Helpers
super.description: Robotic rats for cleaning up? That's right, they explode on contact, dealing damage to opponents and greatly increasing Ash's Rage level.

trait.description: This Brawler has a Rage Bar that gets charged when they hit a Brawler or receive damage. When the Rage Bar is full, it increases this Brawler's damage and movement speed. It depletes over time.

star.name: Foot Patrol
star.description: When Grom's Super is fully charged, he gains +15% faster movement speed!

star.name: X-Factor
star.description: The split from Grom's main attack deals up to +30% extra damage at max distance.

attack.name: Bud Go Boom!
attack.description: Grom hurls Bud, his exploding walkie-talkie! The blast moves in the shape of a cross, hurting enemies caught in its path.

gadget.description: Grom ejects a Watchtower from his Grom Bomb that gives all allies sight into bushes over a large area. The watchtower slowly loses health over time.
gadget.name: Watchtower

gadget.description: Grom's next attack throws 3 Buds in rapid succession.
gadget.name: Radio Check

super.description: Grom launches a devastating bomb with Bud's help! The Grom Bomb inflicts huge damage, breaks walls and the force from its blast pushes all enemies backwards.
super.name: Grom Bomb

attack.description: Are the bullets even real?
attack.name: Finger Pistol

star.description: When Gray has full health, the next damage taken is reduced by 50%.
star.name: Fake Injury
New Perspective
star.description: When Gray or his Allies use Doors, they recover 1000 hit points.

gadget.description: Gray's next hit from the Finger Pistol shoots a walking cane which pulls enemies back by a bit.
gadget.name: Walking Cane
Grand Piano
gadget.description: Gray's next hit from the Finger Pistol will also leave a target on the ground where a piano will land and hurt enemies. It would be too bad if someone would get hurt, right?

super.name: Dimensional Doors
super.description: Gray creates a set of doors for him and his teammates, useful for quick escapes and sneaky attacks!

star.name: Bell'o'mania
star.description: Chester's attack has an extra stage with four bells.
Chester will always know what his next Super will be.
star.name: Sneak Peek

super.name: Jack in the Box
super.description:
CANDY POPPER: Chester throws an exploding candy popper that destroys the environment, knocking back and damaging enemies.

JAWBREAKER: Chester shoots a large, hard candy that stuns enemies on hit.

SALMIAKKI: Chester sprays a cone of salty salmiakki powder that poisons enemies, damaging them over time.

POP ROCKS: Chester sprinkles crackling pop rocks on the ground, damaging enemies over time when standing on it.

STRONG MINT: Chester eats a refreshing mint that heals him over time.

trait.description: This Brawler starts with a random Super that keeps changing after every use.

gadget.name: Spicy Dice
gadget.description: Chester gets a new random Super that is different from his current one.

gadget.name: Candy Beans
gadget.description: Chester eats a mystery flavored candy bean from his cap, gaining a random buff for 5 seconds.

attack.description: Chester shoots a sequence of bells from his cap, first one, then two and lastly three bells.
attack.name: Cap and Bells

super.description: Rico fires a long burst of bullets that pierce through enemies and bounce off walls, gaining range.
super.name: Trick Shot

gadget.description: Rico blasts waves of bouncy bullets in all directions.
gadget.name: Multiball Launcher

gadget.description: Rico's next basic attack will heal him for 200 health from each projectile bounce.
gadget.name: Bouncy Castle

attack.name: Bouncy Bullets
attack.description: Rico's bullets bounce off walls, gaining range. They can hit enemies behind cover.

star.description: Rico's bullets, from attack and Super alike, get Supercharged by their first bounce and deal +124 damage!
star.name: Super Bouncy

star.description: When Rico falls below 40% health, he runs 34% faster!
star.name: Robo Retreat

gadget.name: Warp Blast
gadget.description: Nani detonates Peep and teleports to his last location.

gadget.name: Return to Sender
gadget.description: For the next 2 seconds, the first time Nani takes damage from an enemy, 80% of the damage is returned to the enemy.

star.description: Peep deals up to 1600 extra damage based on his travel distance.
star.name: Autofocus

star.description: Nani takes 80% less damage while her Super is active.
star.name: Tempered Steel

attack.name: Trigger-Nometry
attack.description: Nani shoots 3 light orbs that move at different angles and converge towards aimed targets.

super.name: Manual Override
super.description: Nani takes control of Peep and can steer him remotely into enemies, exploding on contact!

hypercharge.description: Lou's Super instantly freezes enemies in the area.
hypercharge.name: Slushie Storm

super.name: Can-Do
super.description: Lou lobs a can of freezing cold syrup that creates an icy, slippery area on the ground that also slowly freezes enemies. Very tough for his opponents' fancy footwork!

star.description: Opponents standing on Lou's Super area get frozen 33% faster.
star.name: Supercool
Hypothermia
star.description: Opponents lose up to 50% of their damage based on how frozen they are from Lou's attacks.

gadget.description: Lou shields himself with ice, becoming invulnerable for 1.0 seconds.
gadget.name: Ice Block

gadget.description: Instantly adds 50% freeze meter to opponents inside Lou's Super.
gadget.name: Cryo Syrup

attack.name: Brain Freeze
attack.description: Barraging opponents with snow cones, Lou can eventually freeze them in place for 1.5 seconds.

super.description: A big-bada-barrel of dynamite blows up cover. Any surviving enemies get knocked back on impact!
super.name: Big Barrel O' Boom

attack.name: Short Fuse
attack.description: Mike tosses two sticks of dynamite, passing over any obstacles in the way. The fuses are cut as short as Mike's explosive temper!

star.description: Dynamike can ride the blast wave of his explosives to jump over obstacles!
star.name: Dyna-Jump

star.description: Adds +1000 damage to Mike's Super.
star.name: Demolition

gadget.description: Dynamike spins furiously with increased movement speed and throws multiple sticks of dynamite around himself. Each dynamite deals 2000 damage to enemies.
gadget.name: Fidget Spinner
Satchel Charge
gadget.description: Once activated, the next main attack also stuns enemies for 1.5 seconds.

hypercharge.description: Super bomb spawns smaller bombs.
hypercharge.name: Boomer

attack.name: Gunbrella
attack.description: Piper fires a sniper shot from the tip of her parasol. The shot gains more oompf the farther it flies!

star.name: Ambush
star.description: Piper's attack deals +800 extra damage (at max range) when she's hidden in a bush.

star.name: Snappy Sniping
star.description: When Piper hits an opponent with her attack, she reloads 0.4 ammo instantly.

super.name: Poppin'
super.description: Piper hops away to avoid pushy suitors. She leaves them a lady's favor though: live grenades from her garter!

gadget.description: Piper pops a defensive shot at the closest enemy, dealing 100 damage, while also pushing them back and slowing them down.
gadget.name: Auto Aimer
Homemade Recipe
gadget.description: On activation, Piper's next main attack will home in on enemies.

attack.description: Carl throws his Pickaxe like a boomerang. After he catches the returning Pickaxe, he can throw it again.
attack.name: Pickaxe

super.description: Carl goes into a crazy spin for a few seconds, flailing around and damaging nearby opponents.
super.name: Tailspin

gadget.description: The next pickaxe Carl throws will drop a trail of hot rocks behind it! Opponents that touch them are set on fire and receive 627 damage per second.
gadget.name: Heat Ejector
Flying Hook
gadget.description: Carl's next attack makes his pickaxe pull him to the farthest point of the attack.

star.name: Power Throw
star.description: Carl throws his Pickaxe with 13% more speed, allowing it to travel and return faster.
During Carl's Super, all damage he receives is reduced by 35%.
star.name: Protective Pirouette

attack.description: Darryl's double barrel shotguns fire two staggered blasts of heavy close-range damage.
attack.name: Double Deuce

star.name: Steel Hoops
star.description: After Barrel Roll all damage Darryl takes is reduced by 25% for 2 seconds.
When Darryl uses his Super, he doubles his reload speed for 5.0 seconds.
star.name: Rolling Reload

super.name: Barrel Roll
super.description: Darryl rolls forward inside his barrel, knocking back enemies, reducing incoming damage and bouncing off walls. His Super recharges over time!

trait.description: This Brawler charges Super over time.

gadget.description: Darryl spins around and sprays a barrage of shots in all directions. Each shot deals 400 damage and recharges his Super by 25% if it hits enemies!
gadget.name: Recoiling Rotator

gadget.description: Darryl creates a slowing area around himself for 5.0 seconds.
gadget.name: Tar Barrel

hypercharge.description: Leaping high, El Primo drops an Intergalactic Elbow that brings enemies to the Epicenter.
hypercharge.name: Gravity Leap

trait.description: This Brawler charges Super from damage received.

super.description: Leaping high, El Primo drops an Intergalactic Elbow that knocks around enemies and destroys cover!
super.name: Flying Elbow Drop

gadget.description: El Primo grabs the closest enemy within his reach and flips them like a pancake over his broad shoulders.
gadget.name: Suplex Supplement

gadget.description: El Primo summons a small meteor to strike the nearest enemy. It deals 2000 damage and destroys walls.
gadget.name: Asteroid Belt

star.description: Enemies caught in El Primo's Super will burn for 1200 damage over 4 seconds.
star.name: El Fuego
Meteor Rush
star.description: El Primo gains a 25% speed boost for 4.0 seconds after using his Super.

attack.description: El Primo fires off a furious flurry of four fiery fists. That's a spicy jalapeno knuckle sandwich!
attack.name: Fists of Fury

star.description: Nita recovers 800 health whenever her bear hits an enemy Brawler. When Nita deals damage to an enemy Brawler, her bear regains 800 health.
star.name: Bear with Me

star.description: Nita's bear attacks faster. Time between swipes is reduced by 60%.
star.name: Hyper Bear

super.description: Nita summons the spirit of Big Baby Bear to hunt down her enemies.
super.name: Overbearing

hypercharge.name: Hyperbearing
hypercharge.description: Nita hypercharges Bruce, making him increase in size, giving him 15% increased movement speed and 20% increased health.

attack.description: Nita sends forth a shockwave, damaging enemies caught in the tremor.
attack.name: Rupture

gadget.description: Nita commands her bear to slam the ground, stunning all enemies within its reach.
gadget.name: Bear Paws
Faux Fur
gadget.description: For the next 3.0 seconds, Nita's bear gets a 35% shield against damage.

hypercharge.description: Max throws an energy drink to each team member, increasing their movement speed and granting them 25% Super charge
hypercharge.name: Unlimited Energy

attack.name: Faster Blaster
attack.description: Max's blaster shoots a bunch of projectiles fast! It holds a lot of rounds, and Max is quick with the reload.

gadget.description: Max dashes forward, and becomes immune to all damage from enemies while dashing.
gadget.name: Phase Shifter

gadget.description: Max blinks back to a place of her choosing after 3.0 seconds' delay, recovering any damage she received in the meantime.
gadget.name: Sneaky Sneakers

super.description: Max momentarily boosts up her movement speed and that of nearby allies. Gotta go fast!
super.name: Let's Go!

star.description: Max now charges her Super while moving.
star.name: Super Charged
Run N Gun
star.description: Max reloads faster while moving.
When receiving damage, Jacky returns the favor by converting 30% of the damage into a Groundbreaker counterattack.
star.name: Counter Crush

star.description: Jacky's Hard Hat protects her by reducing any damage she takes by 20%.
star.name: Hardy Hard Hat

trait.description: This Brawler charges Super from damage received.

hypercharge.name: Seismic Event
hypercharge.description: Holey Moley slows down nearby enemies for 1.5 seconds.

attack.description: Jacky hops on her Jackhammer to shake the ground all around. Enemies caught too close will get a pounding!
attack.name: Groundbreaker

super.description: Jacky drills a hole in the ground, pulling in foes to introduce them to her Jackhammer!
super.name: Holey Moley!

gadget.name: Pneumatic Booster
gadget.description: Jacky gets a burst of energy and moves 25% faster for 4.0 seconds.

gadget.name: Rebuild
gadget.description: Jacky rebuilds the environment in a small radius around her.

star.name: Wild Flames
star.description: Amber can have two fuel puddles on the ground simultaneously and she will recharge her Super automatically when standing near one.

star.name: Scorchin' Siphon
star.description: While being near a puddle of fire fluid, Amber uses it to reload her firebreathing 50% faster.

super.name: Torch 'em!
super.description: Amber throws a flask of her fire fluid that she can then light up with her firebreathing. Bushes and opposing Brawlers will be toast! (One flask at a time!)

attack.name: Dragon's Breath
attack.description: Amber blows a flaming inferno at her opponents. It looks awesome, but watch out or you'll get seared!

gadget.name: Fire Starters
gadget.description: Amber runs fast for 4.0 seconds while spilling her fire fluid, which she can then ignite.
Amber creates 3 orbiting flames around her for 5.0 seconds, dealing 1000 damage on hit.
gadget.name: Dancing Flames

super.description: Mandy shoots a long ray of sugar passing through enemies and environment, dealing massive damage.
super.name: Sugar Ray

star.description: Mandy shoots her candies with 20% more speed while Focused.
star.name: In My Sights

star.description: Mandy receives 30% shield while Focused.
star.name: Hard Candy

gadget.name: Caramelize
gadget.description: Mandy's next candy from her Candy Dispenser slows down enemies on hit for 2.5 seconds.

gadget.name: Cookie Crumbs
gadget.description: Mandy's next candy from her Candy Dispenser pierces enemies and environment.

attack.description: Mandy shoots candy from her Candy Dispenser and while staying still she gains Focus, increasing her attack range.
attack.name: Candy Dispenser

gadget.name: Speedloader
gadget.description: Colt instantly reloads 2 ammo.

gadget.name: Silver Bullet
gadget.description: Colt's next attack is a powerful shot that deals as much damage as 2 of his regular bullets, while going through obstacles and opponents alike.

hypercharge.name: Dual Wielding
hypercharge.description: Bullet Storm is 120% wider.

star.description: Colt's movement speed is increased by 13%.
star.name: Slick Boots
Magnum Special
star.description: Colt's attack range and bullet speed are increased by 11%.

attack.name: Six-Shooters
attack.description: Colt shoots six straight long-range shots out of his revolvers.

super.name: Bullet Storm
super.description: Colt rattles off a massive burst of bullets that shoot extra far and destroy cover.

star.name: Insta Beaload
star.description: Instantly Supercharge Bea's Big Sting one time if she misses a Supercharged shot.
Bea receives a 30% shield while Big Sting is Supercharged.
star.name: Honeycomb

gadget.description: Bea drops a beehive with a splash of sticky honey around it. The honey slows down enemies that step in it.
gadget.name: Honey Molasses
Rattled Hive
gadget.description: Bea unleashes 4 angry bees that circle away from her, dealing more damage the further they go (up to 1000 damage).

attack.name: Big Sting
attack.description: Bea sends out a long range shot that, upon landing, Supercharges her next shot to deal epic damage!

super.description: Bea deploys a swarm of drones that move and turn like jets. They slow down any opponents caught in their path.
super.name: Iron Hive

attack.name: High Note
attack.description: Janet sings a loud note. The longer she holds the note, the more focused it will become and the farther it will fly.

super.name: Crescendo
super.description: Janet uses her jetpack to take to the skies for a moment, where she attacks opponents from above for the full duration.

gadget.description: Janet deploys a speaker that deals 100 damage per second to all enemies in the area until it gets destroyed.
gadget.name: Drop the Bass
Backstage Pass
gadget.description: Janet's next High Note pushes her back, even over walls. The more focused her attack is, the further she'll be pushed back.

star.description: While in the air with her jetpack, Janet reveals a large area of bushes around herself.
star.name: Stage View

star.description: Janet's attack focuses 30% faster.
star.name: Vocal Warm Up

super.description: R-T splits into two. R-T's legs are left behind while both R-T and his legs gain a short ranged, powerful attack that marks enemies. R-T moves faster while split.
super.name: Hide and Seek

attack.description: R-T fires a single projectile, that upon impact with a brawler marks them. Any damage dealt to a marked target consumes the mark and deals extra damage.
attack.name: Tap Target

gadget.description: Instantly charges R-T's Super.
gadget.name: Out of Line
Hacks!
gadget.description: Instantly trigger all active marks on all enemy brawlers, dealing their damage.

star.name: Quick Maths
star.description: Marks created last 3 seconds longer.
R-T and his legs take 20% less damage when split.
star.name: Recording

attack.name: Loose Tooth
attack.description: Bonnie shoots a HUGE tooth from Clyde towards her enemies.

star.description: The range of Bonnie's Star Launcher is increased by 36%.
star.name: Black Powder
Wisdom Tooth
star.description: Loose Tooth shatters on hit, dealing 25% extra damage to nearby enemies.

super.description: Clyde launches Bonnie into the air. She can fly over obstacles and deals damage to nearby enemies on landing.
super.name: Star Launcher

gadget.name: Sugar Rush
gadget.description: Clyde's movement and reload speed are increased by 30% for 5 seconds.

gadget.name: Crash Test
gadget.description: Bonnie dashes forward, knocking back enemies and dealing 1000 damage on hit.

gadget.name: Disengage!
gadget.description: Maisie blasts the ground, stunning enemies for 0.5 seconds while dashing forward.
Maisie instantly reloads 1 ammo and increases the next Pressure Rocket damage by 30% of the target's missing HP.
gadget.name: Finish Them!

attack.name: Pressure Rocket
attack.description: The further you run, the faster Maisie's rocket will reach you.

hypercharge.description: Maisie's Super also shoots her basic attack projectiles around her to all directions.
hypercharge.name: Aftermath

super.name: Shockwave
super.description: Don't get too close or a personal space will be created for you.

star.name: Pinpoint Precision
star.description: Pressure rocket deals 20% more damage at max distance.

star.name: Tremors
star.description: Enemies hit by Shockwave are also slowed down for 2 seconds.

super.description: Mr. P deploys the home base for his robo-porters. He has reprogrammed the small penguin-head robots to attack and harass opponents (and unruly guests).
super.name: Porters! Attack!

star.name: Handle with Care
star.description: Every 4 seconds, the explosion damage of Mr. P's next overstuffed suitcase is increased by 40%.

star.name: Revolving Door
star.description: All robo-porters from the home base now have 20% more health and 30% higher damage.

attack.name: Your Suitcase, Sir!
attack.description: Mr. P throws a heavy suitcase with angry intent. Upon hitting an obstacle or reaching maximum range, the suitcase bounces and lands with a bang, dealing area damage.

gadget.description: Mr. P buffs his current porter by increasing its damage by 150 and health by 1000.
gadget.name: Service Bell
Porter Reinforcements
gadget.description: The next attack will spawn a weak porter where the attack lands.

trait.description: This Brawler can move over water.

super.description: Angelo creates a poison cloud that lasts for 8 seconds and damages enemies. While in the cloud, Angelo's arrows become poisoned, dealing extra damage over time.
super.name: Welcome to the Swamp

attack.name: Take Aim
attack.description: Hold the aim to charge up your shots.

gadget.name: Stinging Flight
gadget.description: Fly into the air for 1.0 seconds. Drains 330 health from nearby enemies on takeoff.

gadget.name: Master Fletcher
gadget.description: The next Take Aim pierces enemies and the environment.

star.description: Staying inside the Super will heal Angelo for 300 per second.
star.name: Empower
Flow
star.description: Angelo gains 25% increased movement speed after entering water.
Byron's Super will also cause opponents to receive 75% less healing from any source for 9 seconds.
star.name: Malaise
Injection
star.description: Every 3.5 seconds the next basic attack will pierce through targets.

gadget.description: Byron uses one of his shots to heal himself 800 per second for 3 seconds.
gadget.name: Shot in the Arm

gadget.description: Byron's next attack shoots 3 darts instead of one, each dealing 20% less damage and 40% less healing.
gadget.name: Booster Shots

attack.description: Shoots a long range dart that can hit both opponents and friendlies. Opponents will take damage over time and friendlies will heal over time.
attack.name: Careful Dose

super.name: Full Treatment
super.description: Throws a vial that heals friendlies and damages opponents.

attack.name: Hot Cookies
attack.description: Rapid fire hot cookies directly out from the oven, slightly cooling the oven while damaging enemies on hit. The higher the Heat the higher the damage.

super.description: Consume and release all the built up Heat in an explosion, damaging all nearby enemies. The higher the Heat the higher the damage.
super.name: Let out Some Steam

hypercharge.name: Pyrolytic
hypercharge.description: Let Out Some Steam leaves a burning area behind for 4.5 seconds.

star.description: Super will consume 50% less Heat when used.
star.name: Heat Retention

star.description: While the Heat is over 80%, reduce damage taken by 20%.
star.name: Heat Shield

gadget.description: Next basic attack shoots burning cookies, dealing 40% extra damage over 3 seconds.
gadget.name: Overcooked

gadget.description: Next basic attack shoots perfectly baked cookies healing allies for 25% of the damage overtime instead.
gadget.name: Made with Love

trait.description: This Brawler's damage increases slowly over time.

attack.description: Colette fires a shot that takes what you owe! And the more you have, the more you owe.
attack.name: Taxing Shot

gadget.description: Colette's next shot deals an extra 1000 damage.
gadget.name: Na-Ah!
Gotcha!
gadget.description: On activation, Colette's shots heal herself for 5.0 seconds for 80% of the damage dealt.

super.name: Time to Collect
super.description: Colette makes a dash forth and back, dealing taxing damage to everyone in her path, based on their maximum health.

star.name: Push It
star.description: All enemy Brawlers hit by Colette's charge are carried to the farthest point of the attack!
Colette's Super gives her a 20% shield for 5.0 seconds. Every enemy Brawler hit by it will add 10% more protection.
star.name: Mass Tax

hypercharge.description: Colette's spirit follows her during her dash, damaging enemies on the way.
hypercharge.name: Teen Spirit

super.description: Melodie can dash forward multiple times to catch her enemies.
super.name: Catchy Chorus

gadget.name: Perfect Pitch
gadget.description: Melodie's notes get 25% increased movement speed and 60% wider orbit for 5 seconds.

gadget.name: Interlude
gadget.description: Melodie gains 10% Shield from each note orbiting her.

star.description: Melodie gains 6% increased movement speed from each note orbiting her.
star.name: Fast Beats

star.description: Melodie's notes last for 25% longer before vanishing.
star.name: Extended Mix

attack.description: Melodie shoots tiny monster notes from her mic, damaging enemies and spawning orbiting notes around her on hit.
attack.name: Monster Notes

star.name: Circling Eagle
star.description: Bo spots enemies hidden in bushes from 150% longer distance than normally.
Instead of a knockback, Bo's traps now stun the enemy for 2.0 seconds!
star.name: Snare a Bear

attack.description: Bo releases a trio of exploding arrows, tearing up enemies like an eagle's talons.
attack.name: Eagle-Eyed

gadget.description: Bo places a totem that increases allies' Super charging rate by 50%. The totem slowly loses its health over time.
gadget.name: Super Totem

gadget.description: Bo triggers all of his mines after 1.5 seconds. During the delay the mines are completely undetectable to opponents.
gadget.name: Tripwire

super.description: Bo hides explosive traps in the ground. When triggered by an enemy, the traps explode after a short delay, knocking back and damaging enemies.
super.name: Catch a Fox

star.name: Power Hungry
star.description: Kit gains 200% power from each Power Cube.

star.name: Overly Attached
star.description: Kit attaches to friendly brawlers for 5 seconds longer.

trait.description: This Brawler charges Super over time.

attack.name: Claws
attack.description: Claw nearby enemies in a cone.

gadget.name: Cardboard Box
gadget.description: Hide in a cardboard box becoming invisible for 3 seconds. Charges the Super 100% faster while stationary.
Heals himself and the friendly Brawler he is attached to for 40%.
gadget.name: Cheeseburger

super.description: Jump and attach to the back of another Brawler. Heals allies and damages enemies over time.
super.name: Carry Me

super.description: Gale delivers an almighty gust of wind and snow, pushing back all enemies caught in its path.
super.name: Gale Force!

gadget.name: Spring Ejector
gadget.description: Gale drops a bounce pad underfoot, launching friend and foe alike into the air.

gadget.name: Twister
gadget.description: Gale uses his leaf blower to create a local tornado, which will push away any opponents that try to pass through.

star.description: Gale's Super now stuns enemies for 1.25 seconds if they are pushed against obstacles.
star.name: Blustery Blow

star.description: Gale's snow balls now also slow down opponents for 0.5 seconds.
star.name: Freezing Snow

attack.description: Gale blasts a large snow ball wall at his enemies!
attack.name: Polar Vortex

super.name: Call for Backup
super.description: Throw a signal to summon your twin Lawrie for help. He will seek out any trouble makers and serve justice with his taser gun.

star.name: Protocol: Protect
star.description: While Lawrie is in range, transfer all incoming damage to him instead.

star.name: Protocol: Assist
star.description: While Lawrie is in range, reload 30% your ammo whenever he damages an enemy.

gadget.description: Swap weapons with Lawrie.
gadget.name: Order: Swap
Order: Fall Back
gadget.description: Dash towards Lawrie while Lawrie dashes towards you, healing both for 33% of max health.

attack.name: Ticket Dispenser
attack.description: Shoot a ticket bundle over obstacles that explodes twice after landing, damaging nearby enemies.

star.name: Rude Sands
star.description: Sandstorm now also damages enemies for 100 damage per second.
Sandstorm now also heals friendly Brawlers for 300 health per second.
star.name: Healing Winds

attack.description: Sandy pelts enemies with sharp, piercing pebbles. Ouch!
attack.name: Pebble Blast

gadget.name: Sleep Stimulator
gadget.description: Sandy falls asleep for 1.5 seconds and his health is fully restored.
Sandy's next attack lulls opponents to sleep for 1.0 seconds. They will, however, wake up from any damage.
gadget.name: Sweet Dreams

hypercharge.name: Swift Winds
hypercharge.description: Sandy grants himself and his allies 20% increased movement speed while inside of Sandstorm. His Super will also silence enemies for 0.5 seconds when it lands.

super.description: Sandy summons a sandstorm that lasts for 9 seconds and hides friendly Brawlers inside it.
super.name: Sandstorm

trait.description: This Brawler charges Super from damage received.

super.description: Draco mounts up on his fire breathing dragon, gaining increased movement speed and damage reduction.
super.name: Dragon Solo

attack.name: Lance Stab
attack.description: Draco thrusts his lance forward, piercing and damaging enemies in front of him, dealing more damage at max range.

gadget.description: The next Lance Stab also throws enemies in the air for a short time.
gadget.name: Upper Cut
Last Stand
gadget.description: Draco can not fall under one health for 2 seconds.

star.description: Every 5 seconds, the next Lance Stab exposes enemies on hit. Exposed enemies take 35% increased damage for 5 seconds.
star.name: Expose
Shredding
star.description: Dragon Solo now also heals for 1375 when activated.

attack.name: Loony Balloons
attack.description: Gus shoots balloons at enemies. After several hits, a spirit will drop. Collected spirits will restore some health to Gus or his teammates.

gadget.name: Kooky Popper
gadget.description: Explode all uncollected spirits, dealing 1400 damage to nearby enemies.

gadget.name: Soul Switcher
gadget.description: Gus loses 5% health but gains 100% spirit instantly.

super.name: Spooky Boy
super.description: Gus uses Spooky (a balloon creation and also his best friend), to create a shield around himself or one of his teammates and pushes nearby enemies back

star.description: Healing gained from spirits is increased by 100%.
star.name: Health Bonanza
Spirit Animal
star.description: Spooky increases the damage of a teammate by 25% for 5 seconds.

gadget.description: The next Snack Attack only heals allies but doubles the amount.
gadget.name: Double Sausage

gadget.description: The next Snack Attack only damages enemies but doubles the amount.
gadget.name: Extra Mustard

super.description: A special spiced up hot dog for a target ally or Doug himself. When a buffed Brawler is defeated they will come back with 100% health after a short delay.
super.name: Second Serving

attack.description: Fresh food for friends, expired for others. Heals allies and damages enemies the closer they are to you.
attack.name: Snack Attack

star.description: Resurrected targets gain increased movement speed for 3 seconds after being resurrected.
star.name: Fast Food
Self Service
star.description: Snack Attack also heals Doug by 20% of the normal value.

attack.description: Meg fires a short burst from her blaster that pokes at her enemies' patience.
attack.name: Target Acquired

gadget.name: Jolting Volts
gadget.description: Heal the Mecha by 300 health per second for 5.0 seconds.
Meg drops her toolbox, which increases the reload speed for nearby allies by 35% until it gets destroyed.
gadget.name: Toolbox

star.name: Force Field
star.description: Meg is protected by a 25% shield for 10 seconds when her Mecha is destroyed.
Upon expiring, the Mecha suit explodes, dealing 1500 damage to nearby opponents and pushing them away.
star.name: Heavy Metal

super.description: Meg jumps into her Mecha suit for some colossal carnage!
super.name: Mega Machina

attack.name: Power Chord
attack.description: Poco strums his guitarrón, sending forward bone-jarring sound waves. Enemies hit by the waves take damage.

gadget.description: Poco and all nearby allies heal 400 health per second for 5.0 seconds.
gadget.name: Tuning Fork

gadget.description: Removes active adverse effects from friendly Brawlers in a large area and gives a 2.0 second immunity.
gadget.name: Protective Tunes

star.description: When Poco's attack hits friendly Brawlers they now heal for 700 health.
star.name: Da Capo!

star.description: Poco's Super now also hits enemies, dealing 1000 damage.
star.name: Screeching Solo

super.name: Encore
super.description: Poco heals himself and all friends he can reach with his uplifting melody. Does not affect enemies.

attack.description: Sprout propels a ball of seeds that bounces around before bursting with a bang! If it makes contact with enemies, it explodes on impact.
attack.name: Seed Bomb

star.description: Every 5.0 seconds, the next Seed Bomb will explode with a larger explosion radius.
star.name: Overgrowth

star.description: Sprout activates a shield, partially protecting itself from all attacks while inside a bush.
star.name: Photosynthesis

hypercharge.name: Thorns
hypercharge.description: Sprout's vine hedge now damages nearby enemies.

gadget.description: Sprout consumes a bush to restore 1500 health.
gadget.name: Garden Mulcher
Transplant
gadget.description: Sprout destroys its current Hedge, but will instantly have its Super fully charged again.

super.description: Sprout uses its Super Seed to grow a thick vine hedge, creating an impassable though temporary obstacle.
super.name: Hedge

attack.name: Blaster Beams
attack.description: Shoots a burst of Blaster Beams that damage any opponent they hit. The beams have a slight spread.

star.description: Increases the Damage Booster's range by 50% and boosts damage by an additional 15%.
star.name: Boosted Booster
Plugged In
star.description: When 8-Bit is near his Damage Booster, he will plug in and have increased movement speed.

super.name: Damage Booster
super.description: Deploys a turret that increases the damage output of all friendly Brawlers in its area of effect.

gadget.name: Cheat Cartridge
gadget.description: 8-Bit instantly teleports to his Damage Booster.
8-Bit's next attack has the number of projectiles increased to 18.
gadget.name: Extra Credits

super.description:
With each Super, Surge gets upgraded (max 3). Upgrades are lost when Surge is defeated.

STAGE 1: Boosted movement speed
STAGE 2: Increased weapon range
STAGE 3: Main attack splits into 6 (instead of 2)
super.name: Party Tricks

attack.name: Juice of Justice
attack.description: Surge serves a shot of Juice that splits in two on contact with enemies.

gadget.name: Power Surge
gadget.description: Surge overloads his circuits and increases his upgrade level by 1 for 10 seconds.
Within the next 2.0 seconds, Surge consumes 50% of the damage of the next incoming hit and uses the energy to reload 2 ammo.
gadget.name: Power Shield

star.description: Surge's main attack now splits when hitting walls.
star.name: To the Max!
Serve Ice Cold
star.description: Surge keeps his Stage 1 Super upgrade for the full match duration.

gadget.description: Squeak's next Sticky Blomb deals 50% more damage and has 100% longer range.
gadget.name: Windup

gadget.description: Squeak's next Sticky Blomb leaves a residue area behind after exploding, slowing down enemies and giving allies sight into bushes for 6 seconds.
gadget.name: Residue

attack.name: Sticky Blomb
attack.description: Squeak's sticky blobs of goo are unstable, and blow up with a big splash and an ouch! They attach to any opponent they hit outright.

super.description: Squeak lobs a blob that blows up with aplomb! The explosion of goo sends six smaller Sticky Blombs in all directions.
super.name: Big Blob

star.description: Each opponent within the area of a Sticky Blomb's explosion increases the Blomb's damage by 15%.
star.name: Chain Reaction

star.description: Secondary Sticky Blomb explosions from Squeak's Super also slow down opponents for 4 seconds.
star.name: Super Sticky

super.name: Stick Around!
super.description: Spike lobs a thorny grenade. Enemies caught in the blast area take damage and are slowed down.

attack.name: Needle Grenade
attack.description: Spike fires off a small cactus that explodes, shooting spikes in different directions.

star.description: After using Super, Spike regenerates 1000 health per second by staying in its area of effect.
star.name: Fertilize
Curveball
star.description: Spikes from the cactus grenade fly in a curving motion, making it easier to hit targets.

gadget.name: Popping Pincushion
gadget.description: Spike shoots 3 waves of needles in all directions, dealing 1080 damage per hit.
Spike grows a large cactus with 1750 health to give cover to friendlies. If destroyed, the cactus bursts, and all nearby friendlies recover 1000 health.
gadget.name: Life Plant

hypercharge.name: Blooming Season
hypercharge.description: Stick Around has 20% larger area.

attack.name: Spinner Blades
attack.description: Leon flicks his wrist and fires four Spinner Blades. The blades deal less damage the farther they travel.

hypercharge.name: Limbo
hypercharge.description: Leon stays invisible while attacking his enemies.

gadget.description: Leon creates an illusion of himself to confuse his enemies.
gadget.name: Clone Projector

gadget.description: Leon creates a stealthy area for his team to hide in. The lollipop slowly loses its health over time.
gadget.name: Lollipop Drop

star.description: When Leon uses his Super, he gains a 30% boost to his movement speed for the duration of his invisibility.
star.name: Smoke Trails

star.description: Leon recovers 1000 health per second while his Super is active.
star.name: Invisiheal

super.name: Smoke Bomb
super.description: Leon becomes invisible for 6 seconds. If he attacks, he will be revealed. Enemies close to Leon will be able to spot him.
Penny sets up her cannon! It can shoot at enemies at a long range, over cover and setting the ground on fire.
super.name: Old Lobber

star.name: Heavy Coffers
star.description: Penny's gold pouches burst with a 100% wider cone after each hit.

star.name: Master Blaster
star.description: Penny's cannon deals 1000 damage and knocks back nearby enemies on landing.

attack.name: Plunderbuss
attack.description: Shoots out a pouch of fool's gold. If the pouch hits an enemy, it bursts and coins pepper targets behind the first enemy.

gadget.description: Penny drops a barrel of salt that blocks enemy projectiles. She can also use it to burst her own gold pouches.
gadget.name: Salty Barrel

gadget.description: Penny's cannon blasts at every visible enemy position within range.
gadget.name: Trusty Spyglass

gadget.description: Bibi heals 600 health per second for 4.0 seconds.
gadget.name: Vitamin Booster

gadget.description: Bibi's next Spitball slows down enemies on hit for 3 seconds!
gadget.name: Extra Sticky

super.description: Bibi bats a bouncing ball of bubble gum that can go through enemies, and even hit the same target multiple times!
super.name: Spitball

attack.description: Bibi swings her baseball bat. When she has three swings at the ready, her Home Run bar will charge. Once fully charged, her next swing will knock back enemies!
attack.name: Three Strikes

hypercharge.description: Bibi's bouncing ball splits when hitting an enemy.
hypercharge.name: Out of Bounds

star.name: Home Run
star.description: Bibi's movement speed is increased by 12% when her Home Run bar is fully charged.

star.name: Batting Stance
star.description: When Bibi's Homerun bar is fully charged, she shields herself from all damage by 20%.

gadget.description: Lola's Ego stops moving to strike a pose! Gaining a 75% shield for 4 seconds.
gadget.name: Freeze Frame

gadget.description: Lola and her Ego switch locations. She recovers 1000 health.
gadget.name: Stunt Double

star.name: Improvise
star.description: When down to her last round, Lola deals an extra 30% damage.
Projectiles from Lola's Ego will heal allies that are caught in its path by 150 health.
star.name: Sealed with a Kiss

super.name: Megalomaniac
super.description: Lola releases her Ego that mimics her every move. If it's too close to Lola though, it will deal less damage.

attack.description: Lola's favorite accessory is also her favorite weapon! It shoots from the eyes in short bursts and with plenty of panache.
attack.name: Diamond Eyes

gadget.description: Jessie triggers a shockwave from her turret, slowing down all enemies within its area of effect.
gadget.name: Spark Plug
Recoil Spring
gadget.description: Scrappy's attack speed is doubled for 5.0 seconds.

star.description: Jessie can repair her gun turret for 896 of its missing health by zapping it with her attack.
star.name: Energize
Shocky
star.description: Scrappy the Turret now shoots energy orbs that bounce between enemies. The orbs' range after a bounce is 51% of normal range.

hypercharge.description: Jessie's turret has 50% more health and deals 20% more damage.
hypercharge.name: Scrappy 2.0

super.description: Jessie deploys a gun turret that automatically shoots at enemies. It's made of 100% recycled materials!
super.name: Scrappy!

attack.description: Jessie fires off an energy orb. After hitting a target the orb bounces to the next target in range, hitting up to three enemies. Each bounce deals 25% less damage.
attack.name: Shock Rifle
Rockin' Rocket
attack.description: Brock lets fly with a single Rockin' Rocket that really goes the distance.

hypercharge.name: Rocket Barrage
hypercharge.description: Brock fires a Rocket Barrage, raining down rockets in the targeted area simultaneously in 4 waves.

star.description: Rocket Rain now rains down 44% more rockets.
star.name: More Rockets!
Rocket No. 4
star.description: Brock loads a fourth rocket into his launcher, increasing his ammo capacity (and discarding the thermos bottle he's been keeping in his launcher's fourth tube).

super.description: Brock fires a rocket barrage that takes out enemies and obstacles. He only wants to see you bathing in the Rocket Rain!
super.name: Rocket Rain

gadget.name: Rocket Laces
gadget.description: Brock blasts the ground below him and propels himself into the air. The explosion deals 500 damage to nearby enemies.
Brock's next attack is a mega rocket that is bigger, badder, faster and destroys walls.
gadget.name: Rocket Fuel

gadget.description: Tick's next attack fires 6 mines.
gadget.name: Mine Mania

gadget.description: Tick gains a 50% shield for 1.0 seconds. After that, it bursts out for 1000 damage.
gadget.name: Last Hurrah

hypercharge.description: Tick quickly deploys his head, charging enemies faster and leaving behind 6 of his minimines on explosion.
hypercharge.name: Headstrong

star.name: Well Oiled
star.description: When Tick takes no damage and doesn't attack, he starts recovering health 2.0 seconds faster than normal.

star.name: Automa-Tick Reload
star.description: Tick's reload time is 10% shorter.

super.name: Headfirst
super.description: Tick detaches and launches his head. After landing, the head hops toward the nearest target and explodes on contact!

attack.description: Tick lobs a cluster of mines that separate before landing. The mines explode on contact with a target, or after a few seconds.
attack.name: Minimines
Double-Barrel Laser
attack.description: Ruffs' twin-laser bounces off walls multiple times. They can hit opponents behind cover.

gadget.name: Take Cover
gadget.description: Ruffs throws down 3 sandbags as cover. Each one has 35% of Ruffs' max health.

gadget.name: Air Support
gadget.description: Ruffs calls a barrage around the nearest opponent, dealing 700 damage with each hit.

star.description: Supply Drop now includes a bomb that adds 120% more damage to the drop and also allows it to destroy walls.
star.name: Air Superiority
Field Promotion
star.description: Friendly Brawlers have their maximum health increased by 30 every second that they are in range of this ability while it's active.

super.description: Ruffs calls down a supply drop that damages any opponent it hits, and leaves a power-up for friendly Brawlers to pick up. The power-up increases health and damage. Multiple power-ups do not stack, and you lose the power-up if defeated.
super.name: Supply Drop

attack.description: Buzz blows on his lifeguard whistle, piercing nearby ears five times in an arc.
attack.name: Buzz off

star.description: The minimum duration of Buzz's Super stun is increased by 0.5 seconds.
star.name: Tougher Torpedo
Eyes Sharp
star.description: Buzz's Super charging area is increased by 33%.

gadget.description: Instantly fills the Super meter, but the next Torpedo Throw doesn't stun opponents.
gadget.name: Reserve Buoy
X-Ray-Shades
gadget.description: Buzz can see into all bushes in his Super charging area for 12 seconds.

trait.description: This Brawler charges Super from staying close to opposing Brawlers.

super.description: Buzz throws out his torpedo buoy. If it hits an opponent or a wall, Buzz hauls himself over there, stunning nearby opponents where he lands.
super.name: Torpedo Throw

hypercharge.name: Buzzwatch
hypercharge.description: Buzz's torpedo can now be used again if he hits a wall.

super.description: Throw a seed in a straight line. If it hits an enemy, Lily teleports behind them
super.name: Flourish

star.description: After teleporting to an enemy, Lily's next attack deals 600 more damage
star.name: Spiky

star.description: Gain 15% movement speed while an enemy is in her Super charge radius
star.name: Vigilance

trait.description: This Brawler charges Super from staying close to opposing Brawlers.

gadget.name: Vanish
gadget.description: Lily enters the Shadow Realm for 3 seconds

gadget.name: Repot
gadget.description: The next flourish, becomes a thrown attack, and Lily teleports to the destination on impact

attack.description: Lily stabs in front of her with her thorns, dealing damage
attack.name: Thorn in the Side

trait.description: This Brawler charges Super from damage received.

attack.name: Hands of Stone
attack.description: Rosa throws a flurry of powerful punches with perfect technique!

gadget.description: Rosa fertilizes the ground around her and bushes instantly grow to provide great cover.
gadget.name: Grow Light
Unfriendly Bushes
gadget.description: All opponents hiding in bushes take 100 damage and get slowed down for 3 seconds.

hypercharge.name: Grasping Roots
hypercharge.description: Rosa slows down all nearby enemies while her Super is active.

star.name: Plant Life
star.description: Rosa recovers 200 health per second when inside a bush.

star.name: Thorny Gloves
star.description: Rosa's punches gain +220 damage during her Super.

super.name: Strong Stuff
super.description: Rosa gets a second skin of tough vine for 3 seconds, decreasing all damage received by 70% for the duration.
Pam's healing turret will fix up her and teammates who stay in its area of effect.
super.name: Mama's Kiss

gadget.description: Pam triggers her turret to emit a pulse that heals allies inside the turret's range, including herself, for 1200 health.
gadget.name: Pulse Modulator

gadget.description: Each hit from Pam's next attack removes 25% of opposing Brawlers' maximum ammo. Pam reclaims 50% of the ammo for herself.
gadget.name: Scrapsucker

star.name: Mama's Hug
star.description: Whenever Pam hits enemy Brawlers with Scrapstorm, she heals herself and nearby friendly Brawlers for 48 health.
Healing turret now also damages enemies for 800 damage per second.
star.name: Mama's Squeeze

attack.description: Pam sprays a large area with bursts of scrap metal. Safety goggles advised!
attack.name: Scrapstorm

gadget.description: Frank clears any disabling effect on himself, and momentarily becomes immune to stuns, slows and knockbacks.
gadget.name: Active Noise Canceling

gadget.description: Frank's next attack deals an extra 100% damage and pulls opponents towards him.
gadget.name: Irresistible Attraction

star.description: Frank steals the power of a Brawler he defeats, increasing his damage by 50% for 12 seconds!
star.name: Power Grab

star.description: Frank gains +1100 health.
star.name: Sponge

super.name: Stunning Blow
super.description: Frank's greatest hit sends a shockwave that destroys environment and stuns enemies for a while.

trait.description: This Brawler charges Super from damage received.

attack.description: Frank takes a while to wind up his hammer blow, but the hit is so hard it sends a shockwave.
attack.name: Hammer Hit

attack.description: Stu fires out two pyrotechnic shots that pack quite a wallop.
attack.name: Razzle Dazzle

star.name: Zero Drag
star.description: Stu's Nitro Boost Super dash distance increases by 71%.
Using his Nitro Boost Super restores 400 of Stu's health.
star.name: Gaso-Heal

super.description: Hitting an opponent with Razzle Dazzle charges up Stu's Nitro Boost, a short dash that leaves a trail of burning rubber on the ground. The trail will set fire to any opponents that touch it.
super.name: Nitro Boost

gadget.name: Speed Zone
gadget.description: Stu drops a booster that makes himself, his teammates and other allies move faster while inside its area of effect.
Stu's next Super can bash through obstacles, making debris fly forward. Each piece of debris deals 200 damage to any opponent it hits.
gadget.name: Breakthrough
Water Balloons
gadget.description: The next Balloon Blast also slows down enemies for 3 seconds.
Hank takes 40% reduced damage for 3 seconds.
gadget.name: Barricade

attack.name: Balloon Blast
attack.description: The longer you hold, the deadlier the blast.

super.description: Hank launches Fish Torpedoes in all directions, and he heals for a part of his missing health.
super.name: Fish Torpedoes

star.name: It's Gonna Blow
star.description: When Balloon Blast is charged over 80%, Hank gains 10% extra movement speed.

star.name: Take Cover!
star.description: Hank takes 20% less damage when near a wall.
When Fang defeats an enemy Brawler with his Super, it's recharged instantly, allowing him to use his Super again!
star.name: Fresh Kicks
Divine Soles
star.description: Reduce 500 damage from incoming hits once every 3 seconds. Maximum reduction is 90% of the incoming damage.

gadget.name: Corn-Fu
gadget.description: Fang tosses a handful of corn kernels into the air, making it rain popcorn! Each kernel pop deals 750 damage.
Fang spins and hits all enemies around him, stunning them for 0.5 seconds.
gadget.name: Roundhouse Kick

attack.name: Wu-Shoe
attack.description: Fang unleashes a swift kick with a hidden trick. If the kick misses the target, his shoe will fly off his foot!

super.name: Sneak Ahead
super.description: Fang flies into a nasty kick that, upon contact, can chain a further 3 consecutive kicks to nearby enemies.

hypercharge.description: Charge through walls while dropping popcorn on the way.
hypercharge.name: Dragon Kick

gadget.description: Emz pushes back all enemies around her while also dealing 500 damage.
gadget.name: Friendzoner
Acid Spray
gadget.description: Emz's next blast of hair spray can pass through walls, but deals 10% less damage.

super.description: Emz creates a cloud of toxicity around herself, slowing down the movement of enemies and damaging them.
super.name: Caustic Charisma

star.name: Bad Karma
star.description: Enemies that stay within the cloud of Emz's toxic hair spray suffer increasing damage, 25% per hit.

star.name: Hype
star.description: Emz recovers 420 health per second for each enemy Brawler inside her Super's area of effect.

attack.description: Emz gives you a blast of her hair spray! It's strong enough to melt your face.
attack.name: Spray

star.name: Positive Feedback
star.description: Belle gains a 20% shield whenever her Electro-Bolts hit a target.

star.name: Grounded
star.description: Getting marked by Belle's Super prevents the opponent from reloading their attack for 5 seconds.

hypercharge.description: Belle's spotting shot automatically follows the closest target.
hypercharge.name: Magnetic

attack.description: Belle shoots a long range Electro-Bolt, dealing damage to any target hit. After a short delay, the bolt will jump to any nearby target, deal damage and jump to the next one.
attack.name: Shocker

gadget.name: Nest Egg
gadget.description: Belle places a trap on the ground that will explode when triggered by an opponent. The trap deals 500 damage, and slows down anyone within its blast radius for 3 seconds.
Belle's next Electro-Bolt bounces from walls.
gadget.name: Reverse Polarity

super.name: Spotter
super.description: Belle fires a spotting shot that marks any opponent it hits. The marked opponent takes extra damage from any source. Only one target can be marked at a time.
Tara conjures up a mind-boggling gravity well! Enemies in the area of effect get pulled in, crashing together painfully hard.
super.name: Gravity

star.description: Tara's Super cracks open a dimensional portal! A shadowy version of Tara appears and attacks her enemies.
star.name: Black Portal
Healing Shade
star.description: Tara's Super cracks open a dimensional portal! A shadowy version of Tara appears to heal Tara and her teammates.

gadget.description: Tara and her allies are able to see all enemies, even inside bushes, for 4.0 seconds.
gadget.name: Psychic Enhancer

gadget.description: Tara surrounds herself with three weak shadows that attack opponents and disappear after 6 seconds.
gadget.name: Support from Beyond

attack.name: Triple Tarot
attack.description: Tara flicks her wrist, snapping off three tarot cards that pierce through enemies. Quite a trick!

super.name: Bulldozer
super.description: Bull puts his head down and bulldozes through opponents and obstacles. He's always been headstrong!

gadget.name: T-Bone Injector
gadget.description: Bull instantly rejuvenates himself for 1500 health.
Bull can interrupt his Super charge and slow all nearby opponents with a massive stomp for 1.5 seconds.
gadget.name: Stomper

attack.name: Double-Barrel
attack.description: Bull's double-barreled shotgun deals heavy damage. It has very short range, so Bull likes to get up close and personal.

hypercharge.description: Bulldozer reduces damage taken by 80%.
hypercharge.name: Jaws of Steel

star.description: When Bull falls below 60% health, his reload speed doubles!
star.name: Berserker

star.description: When Bull falls below 40% health, he gains a shield that reduces all damage he takes by 30%.
star.name: Tough Guy

trait.description: This Brawler charges Super from damage received.

star.name: Monkey Business
star.description: Every 5 seconds, Mico's basic attack steals ammo from his enemies after hitting them.
Mico deals 100% extra damage against non brawlers.
star.name: Record Smash

gadget.name: Clipping Scream
gadget.description: Mico lets out a deafening scream towards the nearest enemy, dealing 272 damage and slowing down enemies for 2 seconds on hit.

gadget.name: Presto
gadget.description: Mico's next jump has 34% longer range.

hypercharge.description: Mico's super also stuns nearby enemies after landing for 1.5 seconds.
hypercharge.name: Sound Check

attack.description: Mico jumps forward for a short distance attacking with his mic boom and damaging nearby enemies after landing.
attack.name: Mic Boom

super.description: Mico jumps out of frame, becoming invulnerable while controlling his landing position and damaging nearby enemies when landing.
super.name: Out of Frame

star.description: Edgar's Super will also deal 1000 damage to nearby enemies upon landing.
star.name: Hard Landing

star.description: Edgar receives 25% more healing from damage he deals.
star.name: Fisticuffs

trait.description: This Brawler charges Super over time.

gadget.description: Edgar's Super charges faster, 525% for 4 seconds.
gadget.name: Let's Fly

gadget.description: Edgar gets a shield that protects him from the next 2000 damage. The shield gets weaker over time.

super.description: Edgar jumps over any obstacle and gets a temporary speed boost. His Super will slowly charge over time.
super.name: Vault

hypercharge.name: Outburst
hypercharge.description: After using Super gain charging speed and reload speed for few seconds.

attack.description: Hits enemies with quick punches, healing himself for each landed punch.
attack.name: Fight Club

super.name: Choo-Choo!
super.description: Dash to the nearest Post in line of sight, damaging enemies on the way. While no Posts are in line of sight, throw a new Post to the ground.

attack.name: Steam Engine
attack.description: Shoots a cloud of steam from Chuck's hat, piercing and damaging enemies.

trait.description: This Brawler charges Super over time.

star.name: Pit Stop
star.description: Increase the maximum amount of Posts by 1.

star.name: Tickets Please!
star.description: Dashing through enemies with his Super will also steal 33% of their ammo.

gadget.name: Rerouting
gadget.description: Chuck removes the nearest Post and recharges his Super.

gadget.name: Ghost Train
gadget.description: Chuck's next Super can go through walls!

gadget.name: Replanting
gadget.description: Cordelius jumps over a piece of terrain quickly.

gadget.name: Poison Mushroom
gadget.description: Cordelius's next main attack shoots a poison mushroom that prevents the enemy from attacking for 1.0 seconds.

hypercharge.name: Complete Darkness
hypercharge.description: Cordelius slows down his targets when sending them to the Shadow Realm.

trait.description: This Brawler charges Super from staying close to opposing Brawlers.

star.description: Hitting the second mushroom to the same target as the first, deals 30% extra damage.
star.name: Comboshrooms
Mushroom Kingdom
star.description: Cordelius spawns 3 mushrooms to the Shadow Realm after using his Super, healing allies and damaging enemies for 730 health on pickup.

attack.name: Mushrooms
attack.description: Cordelius shoots two mushrooms with his gardening tool, damaging enemies on hit.

super.name: This Is My Domain
super.description: Cordelius shoots a Shadow Mushroom that passes through walls and on hit transfers the target and him to the Shadow Realm for 8 seconds. Cordelius has 20% higher movement speed and 30% faster reload speed in the Shadow Realm.

super.name: Hex
super.description: Willow fires a single tadpole towards an enemy brawler, fully healing them and taking control over their mind if it hits. Willow can use the basic attack of the enemy brawler and move them as she pleases. Mind control breaks after 4 seconds or when the brawler reaches 30% HP.

gadget.name: Spellbound
gadget.description: Willow's next Lantern's Curse deals 500 more damage and applies the entire damage instantly rather than over time.

gadget.name: Dive
gadget.description: Willow dives for 2 seconds, becoming untargetable but unable to take any action for the duration.

star.description: Lantern's Curse also reduces reload speed of affected brawlers by 30%.
star.name: Love Is Blind
Obsession
star.description: Hexed enemies gain 33% movement speed while mind controlled.

attack.description: Willow lobs her lantern, dealing damage over time to enemies hit.
attack.name: Lantern's Curse

super.description: Buster projects a shield in front of him, blocking all enemy projectiles and reflecting the energy back towards enemies.
super.name: Montage

star.name: Blockbuster
star.description: Buster's Lens Flare deals 15% more damage for each ally in his Super's charge area.
While Montage is active Buster takes 10% less damage and is immune to knockbacks, slows and stuns.
star.name: Kevlar Vest

trait.description: This Brawler charges Super by staying close to teammates.

gadget.description: Buster heals himself and all nearby allies for 750 health for each ally in his Super's charge area.
gadget.name: Utility Belt

gadget.description: Buster's next Lens Flare pulls enemies towards him.
gadget.name: Slo-Mo Replay

attack.description: Buster shoots a cone of light from his projector, damaging all enemies within range.
attack.name: Lens Flare

star.name: Hearty Recovery
star.description: Upon recalling his Knuckle Busters, Sam instantly recovers 20% of his missing health.
While the Knuckle Busters are on the ground and near enemies, they will charge up Sam's Super.
star.name: Remote Recharge

attack.description: Sam unleashes a double dose of hard-hitting punches. With his gloves on, he deals a lot more damage.
attack.name: Heavy Haymakers

super.name: Knuckle Busters
super.description: Sam throws his Knuckle Busters, dealing damage to all enemies hit, before landing on the ground. His next Super will return them back to his hands and also deals damage.

gadget.name: Magnetic Field
gadget.description: While the Knuckle Busters are on the ground, Sam can activate them to pull in nearby enemies.
Upon landing on the ground, Sam's next deployed Knuckle Busters releases an electric pulse that knocks back enemies.
gadget.name: Pulse Repellent

trait.description: This Brawler starts with a fully charged Super.

super.name: Last Call
super.description: Barley hurls a flurry of fiery bottles, covering a huge area in flames. This one's on the house!

gadget.name: Sticky Syrup Mixer
gadget.description: Barley drops a sticky concoction that leaves a puddle, slowing down all enemies that make contact with it.
Barley throws a healing potion at nearby allies that creates an area that heals for 500 health per second.
gadget.name: Herbal Tonic

star.name: Medical Use
star.description: Barley regains 400 health from each attack.

star.name: Extra Noxious
star.description: Adds +200 damage per second to Barley's attack.

attack.description: Barley lobs a bottle, breaking it on the ground. Enemies take damage from the splash, and more damage over time if they stay in the puddle.
attack.name: Undiluted

hypercharge.description: Cocoon spawns 3 spiders that seek and attack the nearest enemies.
hypercharge.name: Pestilence

gadget.name: Spiders
gadget.description: Charlie releases 3 spiders that seek and attack the nearest enemies.

gadget.name: Personal Space
gadget.description: Charlie cocoons herself, healing 50% of her total health.

super.description: Charlie throws forward a bundle of hair wrapping around an enemy on hit, disabling them until the hairy cocoon is destroyed.
super.name: Cocoon

star.name: Digestive
star.description: Cocooned enemies lose 25% of their health while cocooned.
Cocoon leaves a slimy trail behind it for 5 seconds that slows down enemies walking over it.
star.name: Slimy

attack.name: Yo-Yo
attack.description: Charlie slings her yo-yo forward, damaging the first enemy hit and then returning back to her.

gadget.description: Griff drops a firecracker-filled piggy bank that explodes after a short delay, destroying obstacles and dealing 1000 damage to opponents within range.
gadget.name: Piggy Bank

gadget.description: Griff's next Coin Toss shoots 33% more coins.
gadget.name: Coin Shower

super.description: Griff throws a bunch of sharp-edged banknotes in a wide cone. Too valuable to just give away, they return to him, and may cause paper cuts twice to the same target. Opponents further away take more damage.
super.name: Cashback

attack.description: Angry Griff pelts opponents with coins. He throws three salvos that spread out in a cone.
attack.name: Coin Toss

star.name: Keep the Change
star.description: Furious Griff tosses coins faster, reducing the time for a full salvo by 25%.

star.name: Business Resilience
star.description: Every 2 seconds, Griff regains up to 15% of his missing health.

super.description: Eve releases a big egg, which incubates a group of hatchlings. Hatchlings attach to enemies and deal damage over time.
super.name: Baby Boom

star.name: Unnatural Order
star.description: Reverses the order of the eggs shot by her Egg Shooter.
Every 5 seconds, the next largest egg hitting an enemy of her Egg Shooter will spawn a hatchling.
star.name: Happy Surprise

trait.description: This Brawler can move over water.

gadget.name: Gotta Go!
gadget.description: Eve jumps away and leaves behind a hatchling.
Hatchlings spawned from an active big egg will now heal allies over time instead of dealing damage.
gadget.name: Motherly Love

attack.name: Egg Shooter
attack.description: Eve shoots three eggs in a row, with each one being bigger and dealing more damage than the previous egg.

star.description: Crow's poison saps the strength of enemies, who deal 15% less damage while poisoned.
star.name: Extra Toxic

star.description: Crow deals +152 damage with his attack and Super to targets with 50% or less health.
star.name: Carrion Crow

hypercharge.description: Crow's knives are piercing and are returning like a boomerang.
hypercharge.name: Utility Knives

gadget.name: Defense Booster
gadget.description: Crow gets a shield for 40% of incoming damage for 3.0 seconds.

gadget.name: Slowing Toxin
gadget.description: All currently poisoned enemies are slowed for 2.0 seconds.

super.name: Swoop
super.description: Crow takes to the skies, throwing a ring of poisoned daggers around him both on take-off and landing.

attack.name: Switchblade
attack.description: Crow throws a triple threat of daggers. Enemies hit by the poisoned blades will take damage over time and have all healing effects reduced for the duration.

star.name: Creepy Harvest
star.description: Mortis reaps the life essence of Brawlers he defeats, restoring 20% of his max health.

star.name: Coiled Snake
star.description: Mortis gains his longer dash 2.0 seconds faster.

attack.name: Shovel Swing
attack.description: Mortis dashes forward with a sharp swing of his shovel, creating business opportunities for himself. When he has all three dashes ready, he'll gain a longer dash after a short delay.

gadget.description: Mortis spins his shovel, hitting all enemies around himself for 1000 damage.
gadget.name: Combo Spinner

gadget.description: Mortis reloads faster for 4.0 seconds.
gadget.name: Survival Shovel

super.description: Mortis calls forth a swarm of vampire bats that drain the health of enemy Brawlers while restoring his. Creepy!
super.name: Life Blood

super.description: Otis flings Cil who grabs onto the first enemy hit and prevents them from attacking for a short while.
super.name: Silent Seabed

attack.name: Inky Art
attack.description: Otis squirts a burst of ink drops from his spray gun arm.

gadget.name: Dormant Star
gadget.description: The next starfish will stay on the ground if an enemy is not hit, laying dormant until an enemy gets close.

gadget.name: Phat Splatter
gadget.description: Otis's next attack shoots a giant ink ball that leaves a puddle, dealing 810 damage over time for 3.8 seconds.

star.name: Stencil Glue
star.description: Cil mightily squeezes the enemy with all his might. Preventing them from attacking for 33% longer.

star.name: Ink Refills
star.description: Otis now shoots 33% more ink drops.

attack.name: Smoke Blast
attack.description: Gene shoots a solid ball of magical smoke from his lamp. If the ball doesn't hit a target, it splits up and spreads the damage in a cone.

gadget.name: Lamp Blowout
gadget.description: All enemies close to Gene are instantly pushed back. If at least one enemy Brawler is within range, Gene will also restore 10% of his max health.

gadget.name: Vengeful Spirits
gadget.description: Gene shoots a homing missile at all visible opponents within a large area, dealing up to 1000 damage based on distance.

star.description: Gene heals all friendly Brawlers around him for 400 health per second.
star.name: Magic Puffs
Spirit Slap
star.description: Gene's Magic Hand also damages enemies, dealing 1920 damage on hit.

hypercharge.name: Hyper Hands
hypercharge.description: Gene's Super splits into 3 different hands, each being able to grab one enemy. First goes straight, and the other 2 go diagonally.

super.description: Gene launches a magical hand from his lamp. If the hand hits an enemy, they get pulled back to Gene's location!
super.name: Magic Hand
